2000062.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 3 monsters you control, and cannot be Summoned by other ways. Cannot be destroyed by card effects. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn this card is Summoned. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; place 1 Pressure Counter on it. Monsters on the field with Pressure Counters lose 600 ATK/DEF, but can attack twice during each Battle Phase. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field; place 1 Pressure Counter on it. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field; place 1 Freeze Counter on it. Monsters on the field with Freeze Counters cannot declare an attack or change their battle positions. You can only control 1 "Kyurem - The Freezing Void Dragon".
2000062.name: Kyurem - The Freezing Void Dragon

2000094.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 monsters with different names from your hand to the GY, and cannot be Summoned by other ways. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn this card is Summoned. Cannot be banished by card effects. Once per turn, if this card declares an attack: You can inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a card(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. Once per turn: You can inflict 500 damage to your opponent. You can only control 1 "Reshiram - The White Truth".
2000094.name: Reshiram - The White Truth

2000078.effect:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 3 monsters with different names from your GY, and cannot be Summoned by other ways. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn this card is Summoned. Cannot be targeted by card effects. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; apply the following effect depending on that target's card type.
- Monster: Its effects are negated, also place 1 Thunder Counter on it. Monsters on the field with Thunder Counters lose 500 ATK/DEF and cannot change their battle positions.
- Spell/Trap Card: Destroy it.
You can only control 1 "Zekrom - The Black Thunder".
2000078.name: Zekrom - The Black Thunder

2000116.effect:
"Kyurem - The Freezing Void Dragon" + "Zekrom - The Black Thunder"
Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control, and cannot be Summoned by other ways. Cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can negate the effects of 1 monster your opponent controls, and if you do, destroy it. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can target 2 face-up monsters your opponent controls; negate their effects. If this card leaves the field by a card effect: You can target 1 of your banished "Kyurem - The Freezing Void Dragon" or "Zekrom - The Black Thunder"; add it to your hand. You can only control 1 "Black Kyurem - The Dark Dragon".
2000116.name: Black Kyurem - The Dark Dragon

2000143.effect:
"Kyurem - The Freezing Void Dragon" + "Reshiram - The White Truth"
Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control, and cannot be Summoned by other ways. Cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. This card can attack directly. If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls. Once per turn, if this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If this card leaves the field by a card effect: You can target 1 of your banished "Kyurem - The Freezing Void Dragon" or "Reshiram - The White Truth"; add it to your hand. You can only control 1 "White Kyurem - The Burning Void Truth".
2000143.name: White Kyurem - The Burning Void Truth
2000143.treated_as: White Kyurem - The Burning Void Truth

2000476.effect: Cannot be destroyed by battle. During your Standby Phase: Return this card to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 2 "High Heaven Tokens" (Dragon/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) in Defense Position. . You can target 1 Dragon monster you control; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do that, this cards name becomes the name of the shuffled monster, until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Dragon of Becoming, Ether" once per turn.
2000476.name: Dragon of Becoming, Ether

1980103.effect: You can target 1 "Buster Blader" you control; equip this monster from your hand or field to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster, your opponent cannot send cards from the Deck to the GY. You can send this Equip Card to the GY; add 1 "Destruction Sword" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Inferno Buster Destruction Sword". You can only use this effect of "Inferno Buster Destruction Sword" once per turn.
1980103.name: Inferno Buster Destruction Sword

1980092.effect: Target 1 "Buster Blader" monster you control; during the End Phase, equip 1 "Destruction Sword" monster from your hand or Deck to it. You can banish this card from your GY; shuffle up to 3 of your banished "Destruction Sword" cards into the Deck, except "Masterful Attack of the Destruction Swordsman", and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Masterful Attack of the Destruction Swordsman" once per turn.
1980092.name: Masterful Attack of the Destruction Swordsman
1980092.treated_as: Masterful Attack of the Destruction Swordsman

1980116.effect:
1 "Buster Blader" + 2 Dragon monsters
Must be Fusion Summoned. This card's name becomes "Buster Blader" while on the field or in the GY. Any monsters thiis card battles is banished after damage calculation. You can target 1 Dragon monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, then take control of it until the End Phase. If this card destroys a Dragon monster by battle: You can send 1 card your opponent controls to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Buster Blader, Majesty Destruction Swordsman" once per turn.
1980116.name: Buster Blader, Majesty Destruction Swordsman

2000415.effect:
2 Level 7 monsters
Neither player can target this Xyz Summoned card with card effects, except its own. You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 Level 7 monster from your Deck to your hand, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot activate the effects of monsters with the same name. You can target 1 Level/Rank 7 monster you control; until the end of this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use each effect of "Number 138: Harlequin Diviner" once per turn.
2000415.name: Number 138: Harlequin Diviner

818044.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Super Quant" card from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY: You can place 1 "Super Quantal Mech Ship Magnacarrier" from your Deck face-up to your Field Zone. You can only use each effect of "Super Quantum Black Layer" once per turn.
818044.name: Super Quantum Black Layer

818065.effect:
2 Level 2 monsters
Cannot attack unless it has Xyz Material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; negate that card's effects until the end of this turn. This is a Quick Effect if this card has "Super Quantum Black Layer" as material. Once per turn: You can attach 1 "Super Quantum" monster from your hand or field to this card as material.
818065.name: Super Quantal Mech Beast Ombretitan

1958607.effect: If your Special Summoned monster(s) would be destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to the GY, except "Wingbacklogger", shuffle it into the Deck instead. You can return this Attack Position card to the hand, then target 1 monster in your GY; during the End Phase, add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Wingbacklogger" once per turn.
1958607.name: Wingbacklogger

1958585.effect: Other monsters you control gain 100 ATK/DEF. Attack Position monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster you control, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it.
1958585.name: Airborne Rocketblader

1958613.effect: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 monsters you control (until the end of the next turn), then target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. If a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand, except from the Deck: You can look at 1 of them, and if you do, either Set it to your opponent's field or place it on top of the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Avkalinaru" once per turn.
1958613.name: Avkalinaru

1958631.effect:
"After I brought back your wife from the dead, I figured you would be happier to see her recognize you."

The miracle worker laughed as he watched his most recent master get eaten alive.
1958631.name: Skalagdi the Miracle Worker

1958678.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Futility in Life". Must first be Ritual Summoned in Attack Position.
1958678.name: Principality

1958667.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects.
●Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. If Summoning a non-DIVINE Fusion Monster this way, its effects are negated, also banish it when it leaves the field.
●Ritual Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the Ritual Monster. If Summoning a non-DIVINE Ritual Monster this way, its effects are negated, also banish it when it leaves the field.
1958667.name: Futility in Life

1958623.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters
While this card has material, it cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. If all materials attached to this card are monsters with the same Attribute (min. 1): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster you control and 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return both targets to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Qilin, Majestic Specter" once per turn.
1958623.name: Qilin, Majestic Specter

1958597.effect:
2 monsters with different Types
If this card is Link Summoned: You can banish 1 Level 5 or lower monster from your hand, then target 1 Spell in your GY; place it on top of the Deck. You can target 1 monster this card points to; its original ATK becomes 1900, and if it does, during the end of this Phase, you can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Jillian, False Royalty" once per turn.
1958597.name: Jillian, False Royalty

1216140.effect: When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born". You can only use this effect of "Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born" once per turn.
1216140.name: Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born

1218681.effect: Cannot be Special Summoned, except with the effect of a "Blackclaw" monster. When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can draw 1 card. Once per turn: You can target 1 other Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster you control; place 1 Blackclaw Counter on it, and if you do, increase or decrease its Level by 1 or 2. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Iris the Queen's Equerry" once per turn.
1218681.name: Blackclaw - Iris the Queen's Equerry

1218637.effect: When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can target 1 face-down card your opponent controls; return that target to the hand. You can target 1 face-up card on the field; place 1 Blackclaw Counter on that target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Beast-Warrior monsters. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Lola the Ocean Traveller" once per turn.
1218637.name: Blackclaw - Lola the Ocean Traveller

1218172.effect: When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If you control a "Blackclaw" monster other than "Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine": You can target 1 face-up card on the field; place 1 Blackclaw Counter on that target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Beast-Warrior monsters. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine" once per turn.
1218172.name: Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine

1218579.effect: When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster in your GY, except "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner"; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but its effects are negated. If you control a "Blackclaw" monster other than "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner": You can target 1 face-up card on the field; place 1 Blackclaw Counter on that target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Beast-Warrior monsters. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowey Gunner" once per turn.
1218579.name: Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner

1218310.effect: When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. If you control a "Blackclaw" monster other than "Blackclaw - Paula the Burning Swordsman": You can target 1 face-up card on the field; place 1 Blackclaw Counter on that target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Beast-Warrior monsters. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Paula the Burning Swordsman" once per turn.
1218310.name: Blackclaw - Paula the Burning Swordman

1218727.effect: When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can send 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Blackclaw - Shadow the Sunlight Assassin". You can banish this card and 1 "Blackclaw" Tuner monster from your GY, then target 2 "Blackclaw" cards you control; place 1 "Blackclaw Counter" on each (this is a Quick Effect). You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Shadow the Sunlight Assassin" once per turn.
1218727.name: Blackclaw - Shadow the Sunlight Assassin

1218399.effect: Remove 2 Blackclaw Counters from anywhere on the field; draw 2 cards. During the End Phase, if you have activated this card previously this turn, while this card is in your GY: Change all Attack Position "Blackclaw" monsters you control to Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Blackclaws Pet" per turn.
1218399.name: Blackclaws Pet

1218342.effect: When a "Blackclaw" monster is Normal Summoned to your side of the field: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" monster with higher ATK than the Summoned monster from your Deck to your hand. When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can gain 1000 LP. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaws Bath" once per turn.
1218342.name: Blackclaws Bath

1218209.effect: All "Blackclaw" monsters you control gain 100 ATK/DEF for each Blackclaw Counter on the field. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a face-up "Blackclaw" monster you control: for the rest of this turn, "Blackclaw" monsters you control are unaffected by the effects of face-up cards currently on the field that target "Blackclaw" monsters you control, except by the effects of "Blackclaw" cards. When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck to your hand with a different name, from cards you control and in your GY. If it was a "Blackclaw" card effect, you can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Blackclaws Neko Village" once per turn.
1218209.name: Blackclaws Neko Village

1218423.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects. You can only activate 1 "Blackclaws Rest" per turn.
● If a face-up "Blackclaw" monster you control is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field by your opponent's card effect; gain LP equal to that monster's original DEF, and if you do, shuffle it into the Deck.
● Target 1 face-up "Blackclaw" monster on the field; that target is unaffected by card effects this turn, except "Blackclaw" card effects.
● Target 1 face-up "Blackclaw" monster on the field; that target's ATK/DEF becomes equal to its original ATK and DEF until the end of this turn, then, during the End Phase, if that target is in Attack Position, change it to Defense Position.
1218423.name: Blackclaws Rest

1218767.effect: If you control a "Blackclaw" monster: Target face-down cards your opponent controls, up to the number of "Blackclaw" monsters you control; destroy them. If you control (min. 2) "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters, you can activate this card from your hand.
1218767.name: Blackclaws Epiphany

1306063.effect: You can only control 1 "Retirement of the Legendary Blackclaw". Activate this card by targeting 1 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monster you control and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy them, then Special Summon 1 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck whose Level is less than the original Level of the destroyed monster your opponent controlled, ignoring its Summoning conditions. (This Special Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon.) When it leaves the field, destroy this card. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.
1306063.name: Retirement of the Legendary Blackclaw

1220056.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior monster
You can also Synchro Summon this card by using 2 "Blackclaw" Tuners you control as material. If this card is Synchro Summoned using 2 "Blackclaw" monsters as material, this card can be treated this card as a Tuner while face-up on the field. This card gains 200 ATK for each "Blackclaw" monster in your GY. When this face-up card is targeted by an opponent's card effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand.
1220056.name: Elite Blackclaw - Exila the Moon Spirit
1220056.treated_as: Elite Blackclaw - Exila the Moon Spirit

1219329.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each Blackclaw Counter on the field, and if you do, that target loses ATK/DEF equal to the amount of damage your opponent took by this effect. You can only use this effect of "Elite Blackclaw - Quiaris the Sound of the Storm" once per turn. When this face-up card is targeted by a card effect: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Blackclaw" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
1219329.name: Elite Blackclaw - Quiaris the Sound of the Storm
1219329.treated_as: Elite Blackclaw - Quiaris the Sound of the Storm

1219349.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monster in your GY with 3000 or less ATK, except "Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare"; Special Summon it in Defense Position, ignoring its Summoning conditions. When this face-up card is targeted by an opponent's card effect: Negate that effect. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets exactly 1 other face-up card on your field, or when your opponent targets another "Blackclaw" monster you control for an attack (Quick Effect): That card/effect/attack now targets this card. You can only use each effect of "Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare" once per turn.
1219349.name: Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare
1219349.treated_as: Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare

1302824.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior monster
Must be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Synchro Summoned: Place 2 Blackclaw Counters on this card. When this face-up Synchro Summoned card is targeted by a card effect: Remove 1 Blackclaw Counter from this card; for the rest of this turn, your opponent can only Special Summon 1 monster from the Extra Deck. You can target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of other "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters you control; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member".
1302824.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member
1302824.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member

1219428.effect:
1+ "Blackclaw" Tuners + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type monster
Must be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent cannot target cards they control for card effects. You can only control 1 "Legendary Blackclaw - Phallis the Queen of the Clan".
1219428.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Phallis the Queen of the Clan
1219428.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Phallis the Queen of the Clan

1221838.effect:
1+ "Blackclaw" Tuners + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior monster
Must be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Synchro Summoned: Until the end of the next turn, the first time a face-up "Blackclaw" Synchro Monster(s) would be destroyed by battle or card effect, it is not destroyed. Once per turn, when another monster's effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. You can only control 1 "Legendary Blackclaw - Uldula Origin of the Lighting".
1221838.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Uldula Origin of the Lighting
1221838.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Uldula Origin of the Lighting

1219456.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Synchro Monster
Must be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be Tributed, or used as Fusion Material while face-up on the field. Once per turn, when a face-up "Blackclaw" card is targeted by an opponent's card effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card on your opponent's field that would be an appropriate target for that card/effect; that card/effect now targets the new target.
1219456.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven
1219456.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven

1990865.effect:
"Spirit Reaper" + "King of the Skull Servants"
This card's name becomes "King of the Skull Servants" while in the GY. This card can attack your opponent directly up to thrice during each Battle Phase (your opponent must control no monsters to Attack directly this way.). Cannot be destroyed by battle. Cannot be destroyed by card effects, except its own. If this card is targeted by a Spell/Trap Card or effect, destroy this card immediately after it resolves. If your opponent takes battle or effect damage: You can activate 1 of the following effects. You cannot activate that same effect of "Skull Repear, King of the Spirits" again this turn. ● Your opponent must discard 1 card. ● Target 1 card on the field; destroy it. ● Banish 1 card from the GY.
1990865.name: Skull Repear, King of the Spirits
1990865.treated_as: Skull Repear, King of the Spirits

1990821.effect:
"Pumpking, King of Ghosts" + "Swift Scarecrow"
If this card is Special Summoned: You can apply 1 of these effects, or if you control "Castle of Dark Illusions", you can apply both effects in sequence instead.
 ● Send 1 "Pumprince the Prince of Ghosts" from your Deck to the GY.
● Add 1 "Battle Fader" or 1 "Scrap-Iron" Trap from your Deck to your hand. 
Monsters your opponent controls cannot target monsters you control for attacks, except this one. While you control "Castle of Dark Illusions", your opponent cannot target this card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by card effects. When an attack is declared: You can place 1 Pumpkin Counter on a face-up card you control. (Monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF for each Pumpkin Counter on them.)
1990821.name: Pumpking, King of Scarecrows

1990823.effect:
(This card's Attribute is also always treated as DARK.)
"Silent Abyss" + "Umbral Soul"
If this card was Fusion Summoned using "Polymerization": You can destroy all Spells and Traps on the field. If a monster is destroyed by battle: You can destroy all monsters on the field, except face-up DARK and WATER monsters. If 2 or more cards on the field are destroyed at the same time: You can draw 1 card.
1990823.name: Silent Soul - Umbral Abyss

1990826.effect:
2 "Darklord" monsters including a Level 9 or higher monster
You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters, except "Darklord" monsters. You can only use 1 of the following "The Wretched Darklord" effects per turn and only once that turn.
●During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can send 1 "Darklord" Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY.
● (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 "Darklord" Spell/Trap in your GY; apply that target's effect, then shuffle that target into the Deck. 
● If a card(s) in your GY would be returned to the Deck by the effect of a "Darklord" monster, you can pay 1000 LP to add it to your hand instead.
1990826.name: The Wretched Darklord

1992207.effect: These fries are frightening, they are a large but somehow only 50 Cal?!?
1992207.name: Frightening Fries

1990819.effect:
"Super Roboyarou" + "Super Robolady"
When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it. If a monster you control battles an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: Destroy that opponent's monster. Except the turn this card was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can return this card to your Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Super Duper Robolady" from your Extra Deck.
1990819.name: Super Duper Roboyarou

1990772.effect:
1 Warrior monster you control + 1 non-Dragon monster Special Summoned from your Extra Deck that used a Dragon monster(s) as material for its Summon 
Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase. This card gains the following effect(s) based on the Attribute of monsters used as material for its Fusion Summon.
● A LIGHT monster(s): Once per turn, if a card(s) in your possession is sent to your GY by your opponent's card: You can target 1 card in either GY; banish it or return it to to the hand.
● A DARK monster(s): This card can make up to 2 attacks during each Battle Phase.
● Both a LIGHT and a DARK monster(s): Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation.
1990772.name: Chaos Dragon Knight

1990808.effect:
2 monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, including a Winged Beast and a Wyrm monster, each Summoned using a Beast-Warrior and a Dragon monster as material, respectively
This Fusion Summoned card is unaffected by other card effects, except during the Battle Phase. If a monster(s) is Summoned while you control, this Fusion Summoned card (even during the Damage Step): For the rest of this turn, you cannot Summon monsters with the same Type and/or Attribute of the Summoned monster(s), or if your opponent Summoned the monster(s), apply this effect to both players instead. When an attack is declared: You can draw 1 card.
1990808.name: Chimera, Apex of All Chimera

1990817.effect:
"Hungry Burger" + "Thirsty Cola" + "Frightening Fries"
Each time a monster(s) is sent to the GY, place 1 Hunger Counter on this card for each sent card. This card gains 200 ATK/DEF for each Hunger Counter on it. This card can declare a number of attacks during each Battle Phase equal to half of N +1. Cards you control cannot be destroyed by card effects while your opponent has less than N +1 cards in their GY. (N = The number of Hunger Counters on this card).
1990817.name: Combo Meal #1

1990045.effect:
4+ Machine monsters 
For this card's Fusion Summon, if you use a "Chimeratech" or "Cyber" Fusion Monster(s), it is treated as a number of materials equal to the number of materials used for that monster(s)' Fusion Summon. The original ATK/DEF of this card becomes 750 x the number of Fusion Materials used for its Fusion Summon. This card gains effects based on the materials used for its Fusion Summon. ● A "Chimeratech" monster: Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase. ● A "Cyber Dragon" monster: This card inflicts piercing Battle Damage. ● A "Cyber Ogre" monster: If this card battles an opponent's monster, double this card's ATK/DEF during the Damage Step only. ● A "Cyberdark" monster: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
1990045.name: Cyber Hybrid

1990793.effect:
2 monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, including a WATER and a WIND monster, each Summoned using a FIRE and a EARTH monster as material, respectively
Once per turn: You can destroy 1 card in the Spell & Trap Zone or Field Zone. Once per turn: You can have 1 other monster you control gain 1500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn: You can change 1 face-up monster on the field into face-down Defense Positon. Once per turn: You can banish up to 2 cards from the GYs.
1990793.name: Elemental Genus Ancestor

1990799.effect:
1 Rank 10 or higher Machine monster + 1 Level 10 or higher Machine monster
Once per turn, a Rank 10 Machine Xyz Monster you control can activate its effect without detaching material(s). Once per turn, during your opponent's turn, if this card was Fusion Summoned using a "Number" Xyz Monster as material (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Level/Rank 10 or higher Machine monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position or attach it to a Machine Xyz monster you control as material. If this card is sent to the GY: You can activate this effect; this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase.
1990799.name: Hideous Hazardous Coaster Crasher

1990814.effect:
1 Level/Rank 7 or higher LIGHT Fairy monster + 1 Effect Monster that has activated an effect this turn
If a Counter Trap Card is activated, you can immediately after it resolves, Special Summon 1 Level 4 Fairy monster from your hand or GY in Defense Position. During your Main Phase: You can activate this effect, and when you do, you can reveal 2 Counter Trap Cards in your hand and/or Set in your Spell & Trap Zone to your opponent; add 1 "Guiding Ariadne" or 1 "Parshath" card from your Deck to your hand, also if you did not reveal 2 cards when you activated this effect, destroy 1 card you control. If a Fairy monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can add 1 Trap Card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Solemn Johnson" once per turn.
1990814.name: Solemn Johnson

1990816.effect:
(This card's Attribute is also always treated as FIRE.)
1 Level 7 or higher WATER monster + 1 Level 7 or higher FIRE monster 
During the next Standby Phase, after this card was destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY OR this card was sent to the GY to activate a WATER monster's effect: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position, and if you do, you can destroy 1 other card on the field. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect while this card is in Attack Position (Quick Effect): You can activate 1 of these effects. ● Send 1 WATER monster from your hand or field to the GY; draw 2 cards. ● Negate the activation and if you do, destroy 1 FIRE monster in your hand or field. You can only use each effect of "Steam King Avatar of the Sunken City" once per turn.
1990816.name: Steam King Avatar of the Sunken City
1990816.treated_as: Steam King Avatar of the Sunken City

1990812.effect:
2 Fairy monsters with different Attributes
When this card is Fusion Summoned: You can add 1 "Final Countdown" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "The Last of Days" once per turn. Neither player takes damage. This Fusion Summoned card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card battles an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: That opponent's monster's ATK/DEF becomes 0.
1990812.name: The Last of Days

1990806.effect:
1 monster with 3000 or more DEF + 1 monster with more than 3000 DEF
Must first be Special Summoned by "Polymerization". You take no damage. The first time each turn, each other monster you control would be destroyed by card effects, it is not. Your opponent's monsters cannot target for attacks, and your opponent cannot target with card effects, any monsters you control, except "The Ultimate Defense". If a monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can have this card gain DEF equal to half of the total DEF of the Summoned monster(s).
1990806.name: The Ultimate Defense

1990801.effect:
1 monster with 3000 or more ATK + 1 monster with more than 3000 ATK
Must first be Special Summoned by "Polymerization". Any battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent is doubled. This card inflicts piercing damage. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can have this card gain ATK equal to half of the destroyed monster's ATK while on field.
1990801.name: The Ultimate Offense

1990795.effect:
2 monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, including a LIGHT and a DARK monster, each Summoned using a DARK and a LIGHT monster as material, respectively
All monsters your opponent controls lose 200 ATK/DEF for each banished LIGHT and DARK monster. Once per Chain, during your turn, if a LIGHT monster(s) and a DARK monster(s) are banished at the same time: You can target 1 card on the field; banish it. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can discard 1 card; draw a number of cards equal to the combined number of LIGHT monsters and DARK monsters with different names banished from your hand, field, and GY this turn.
1990795.name: True Chaos Incarnate

1990820.effect:
"Super Robolady" + "Super Roboyarou"
When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Set card on the field; banish it. If a monster you control battles an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: Draw 1 card. Except the turn this card was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can return this card to your Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Super Duper Roboyarou" from your Extra Deck.
1990820.name: Super Duper Robolady

1990797.effect:
6 monsters with different Attributes
Must first be Special Summoned by "Polymerization". Cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only use 1 of the following "X" effects per turn and only once that turn.
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
● Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation.
1990797.name: X

1635283.effect: You can reveal 1 "Elemental Contraption" card in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can Set 1 "Elemental Contraption" Trap Card from your hand. You can activate that card the turn you set it. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. If you would banish a Trap Card from your GY to activate a "Contraption" card's effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use each effect of "Advanced Contraption: Ausilio" once per turn.
1635283.name: Advanced Contraption: Ausilio

1637471.effect: You can reveal 1 other "Contraption" card in your hand; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned this way: You can send 1 "Contraption" Trap from your Deck to your GY. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only use each of the preceding effects of "Mysterious Contraption: Animato" once per turn. A "Contraption" monster that was Xyz or Link Summoned using this card as material gains the following effect.● You can activate the first "Contraption" Trap Card you Set each turn the turn it was Set.
1637471.name: Mysterious Contraption: Animato

1978044.effect: Pay 1000 Life Points: Set 1 "Contraption" Non-Counter Trap that is banished, in your GY or in your Deck, then, if you control a "Contraption" monster, you can activate that card the turn you set it. You cannot Summon monsters from your hand, Deck or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Contraption Assembly" per turn.
1978044.name: Contraption Assembly

1635092.effect: Activate 1 of the following effects;● Add 1 "Contraption" card from your Deck to your hand.● Set 1 of your "Contraption" Trap Cards that is banished or in the GY to your Spell & Trap Zone, except "Contraption Activation", also if you control a "Contraption" monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, that Set card can be activated this turn.You can only activate 1 "Contraption Activation" per turn.
1635092.name: Contraption Activation

1628372.effect: You can Target 1 "Contraption" monster or 1 "Elemental Contraption" card that is banished or in your GY; Special Summon that target as a Normal Monster (Machine/LIGHT/Level 6/ATK 0/DEF 0), but banish it when it leaves the field. (That card is also still a Trap) You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 of your "Contraption" cards that is banished or the GY to your hand, except "Contraption Awakened". You can only activate each effect of "Contraption Awakened" once per turn.
1628372.name: Contraption Awakened

1680589.effect: When a card or effect is activated while you control a face-up "Contraption" monster: Shuffle 1 of your banished "Contraption" cards into the Deck; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only activate 1 "Contraption Intervention" per turn.
1680589.name: Contraption Intervention

1830483.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/DARK/Level 6/ATK 1600/DEF 1400). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY; banish 1 card from your opponent's GY. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Caotico" once per turn.
1830483.name: Elemental Contraption: Caotico

1830486.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/FIRE/Level 6/ATK 1800/DEF 1200). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY to target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Cocente" once per turn.
1830486.name: Elemental Contraption: Cocente

1353312.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/WIND/Level 6/ATK 2000/DEF 1000). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Contraption" card from your Deck or GY to your hand. You cannot Special Summon Monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Fresco" once per turn.
1353312.name: Elemental Contraption: Fresco

1830490.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/WATER/Level 6/ATK 1200/DEF 1800). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY to target 1 monster your opponent controls; if it is a Set monster, it cannot be flipped face-up until the End Phase OR, if it is a face-up monster, its effects are negated until the End Phase. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Glaciale" once per turn.
1830490.name: Elemental Contraption: Glaciale

1830492.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/LIGHT/Level 6/ATK 1400/DEF 1600). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY; banish 1 card from your Deck that has the word "Trap" listed in its text, and if you do, during the second Standby Phase after this card's activation, add that banished card to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Luminoso" once per turn.
1830492.name: Elemental Contraption: Luminoso

1353873.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/EARTH/Level 6/ATK 1000/DEF 2000). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Elemental Contraption" card or "Contraption" monster that is banished or your GY, except "Elemental Contraption: Robusto"; either add it to your hand or Special Summon it as a Normal Monster (Machine/LIGHT/Level 6/ATK 0/DEF 0), but banish it when it leaves the field. (That card is also still a Trap.) You cannot Special Summon Monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Robusto" once per turn.
1353873.name: Elemental Contraption: Robusto

1830447.effect: Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Can only be Special Summoned during the turn a "Contraption" monster's effect was activated in the hand, by Tributing 1 "Contraption" Card in the Monster Zone. During the Main Phase: You can activate 1 of the following effects.● You can Set 1 "Contraption" Non-Counter Trap Card from your hand. You can activate that card the turn you set it.● Target 1 "Elemental Contraption" card in your GY; Set it to your field. If that card would leave the field, banish it instead.You can only activate this effect of "Shining Contraption: Mastro Radiante" once per turn.
1830447.name: Shining Contraption: Mastro Radiante

1830455.effect: Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Can only be Special Summoned during the turn a "Contraption" monster's effect was activated in the hand, by Tributing 1 "Contraption" Card in the Monster Zone. During the Main Phase: You can activate 1 of the following effects.● You can target 1 banished "Contraption" Trap Card; return it to the GY.● You can target 1 "Elemental Contraption" Card that is banished; Set it to your field. If that card would leave the field, shuffle it into the Deck instead.You can only activate this effect of "Sinister Contraption: Mastro Tetro" once per turn.
1830455.name: Sinister Contraption: Mastro Tetro

1635051.effect: 2 Level 6 "Contraption" monstersIf the effect of a monster is activated, you can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Negate the activation, and if you do, this card gains 700 ATK. At the end of the Battle Phase, if a "Contraption" monster destroyed a monster by battle, you can target 1 banished "Contraption" card: Add it to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Battle Contraption: Mastro Igneo" once per turn.
1635051.name: Battle Contraption: Mastro Igneo

1829991.effect: 2 Level 6 "Contraption" monstersYou can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card to target 1 "Contraption" monster you control: it can attack directly until the End Phase, but all damage it deals is halved. At the end of the Battle Phase, if another "Contraption" card you control dealt battle damage, you can target 1 "Contraption" card in your GY: Add it to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Soaring Contraption: Mastro Libero" once per turn.
1829991.name: Soaring Contraption: Mastro Libero

1830478.effect: 2 Machine monsters, including a Trap Card in the Monster Zone."Contraption" cards this card points to cannot be targeted by card effects. (Quick effect) You can Tribute this card to target up to 2 "Contraption" cards; They cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects until the End Phase. You can only activate each effect of "Defensive Contraption: Mastro Ferreo" once per turn. During the End Phase, if this card's effect was activated this turn: You can Special Summon this card from your GY.
1830478.name: Defensive Contraption: Mastro Ferreo

1635026.effect:
2 Machine monsters, including a Trap in a Main Monster Zone
If this card is Link Summoned using only "Contraption" cards: this card cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects until the End Phase. When the effect of another card on the field or in the GY is activated (Quick Effect): You can Set 1 "Contraption" Trap from your Deck to your field. If a Trap or a "Contraption" monster this card points to leaves the field: You can target 1 of your "Contraption" Trap that is banished or in the GY; Set it to your field, also it can be activated this turn. You can only activate each effect of "Support Contraption: Mastro Fluido" once per turn.
1635026.name: Support Contraption: Mastro Fluido
